about_para1: NayaGaadi.com is Rural India's first Multi Utility Online Marketplace for all brand New Vehicles.
about_para2: Currently the rural consumer goes to near by Mandal, Taluk, Town, Corporation, City ( Avg 10 to 50 km) for test drives, Financing, registration & delivery for his new vehicle. He has no choice other than visiting the dealer near by town. Indian Rural auto consumer is under served, under represented and under valued.
about_para3: Naya Gaadi founders are passionate about Solving India specific Problems with Technology as enabler.Digitization and Globalization causing transformation of business landscape in every sector of Indian markets.Naya Gaadi vision is in align with the Indian and Global changing business and Technology landscape and needs.
about_para4: NayaGaadi Vision to provide personalized Service and Delivery to the End Customer. It's a step forward in providing hassle free service to the End customer who buys Brand new vehicles from Naya Gaadi platform.

faq_text2: NayaGaadi.com is an NayaGaadi is Marketplace and Multi Brand Shared Sales Experience Centers for Automobiles and Electric Vehicles for Rural and Small Towns in India.
faq_text4: At NayaGaadi.com, our vision is personalized Service and Delivery at the door step of the customer. The e commerce revolution has entered the automobile sector in India with the introduction of NayaGaadi. There is no longer a need to visit Showrooms/Dealers, Banks, Insurance companies and so on to complete your transactions. We understand your demand for a hassle free experience as your RIGHT and we are here to deliver the same. With NayaGaadi.com there is no longer an excuse for your inconvenience.
faq_text5: 3. What are the benefits to ME, the end user?
faq_text6: NayaGaadi provides the buyer with a one stop platform to everything automobile – be it purchase, sale, replacement, repair & servicing, finance, insurance, customization, research and more. At no cost.
faq_text7: To the seller, we offer a vast network of potential customers, customer service tools, information reports and visibility at little to no cost. For more details, please visit the
faq_text9: To our Sales associates we offer a chance to generate revenue and cultivate a low cost business in little time. NayaGaadi offers you the chance to be a part of the marketplace experience in your area. For more details, please visit the
faq_text11: 4. What are the online / offline payment systems available with NayaGaadi.com?
faq_text12: We have both online and offline payment systems. You may pay using your bank’s net banking facility. Additionally you can also choose to make your payment via DD, cheque or cash. Our partners will reach out to you at your door step and collect the payments for further processing.
faq_text13: 5. Do I have to pay 2% charges due to online payment?
faq_text14: No. We have made arrangements to receive payments via net banking through NEFT / RTGS and other options. Hence we have a nominal, fixed flat rate per transaction.
faq_text15: 6. Is there any option to apply for loans online?
faq_text16: Yes. You can apply for a vehicle loan online at NayaGaadi.com through our partner banks. You can also choose to avail the loan at a bank of your choice and have our associates get in touch with you to provide assistance at your door step.
faq_text17: 7. Is there any option to select a particular Insurance company? Do they provide the service online?
faq_text18: Yes, insurance is a feature that will soon be available via NayaGaadi.com. We are currently working with our partners to enable buying the Insurance policy for your brand new vehicle online.
faq_text19: 8. Is NayaGaadi replacing the current show room / physical dealer model?
faq_text20: No. NayaGaadi seeks to work alongside Dealers to help them reach a new generation of customers that prefer the online purchase experience over the traditional brick and mortar store. However, we understand the advantages behind the preference for physical showrooms. Hence, we at NayaGaadi seek to emulate the same experience behind the screen. Thus, increasing the benefits to both our customers and dealers, while decreasing costs simultaneously.
faq_text21: We are partners to our Dealers.
faq_text22: 9. What categories of brand new vehicles are available at NayaGaadi?
faq_text23: We have bikes, e bikes, scooters, cars, buses, tractors, trucks and other such multi utility vehicles. Visit us regularly for new introductions and stay updated on our site for soon-to-release vehicles.
faq_text24: We would also like to bring to your attention that - NayaGaadi is an exclusive marketplace for quite a few electric vehicles.
faq_text25: 10. What are all the personalized services available from NayaGaadi?
faq_text26: We currently provide with vehicle delivery, purchase advisory, complete purchase assistance, assistance with vehicle finance and insurance, provision of test drives, assistance with emergency vehicle repair and servicing, information services and many more. Please check our webpage regularly for updates on personalized services at NayaGaadi.com.
faq_text27: 11. Who are the investors in NayaGaadi?
faq_text28: We are currently at talks with investors with a view to expand operations from Bangalore to other cities. We are also always on the lookout for new investors. Please check our investors page for more information.
faq_text29: 12. Customers prefer to touch and feel the vehicle before purchase. Is such a facility available at NayaGaadi?
faq_text30: Yes. We do arrange Test Drives at your doorstep. We are here to smoothen the purchase experience at the end of the customer. Hence all features that you would expect at a brick and mortar store are available through NayaGaadi.com.
faq_text31: There are additional benefits as well under our
faq_text34: 13. Is it legal to sell brand new vehicles online?
faq_text35: Yes. It is very much legal to sell brand new vehicles online in India
faq_text36: 14. How will the vehicle be delivered to the customer, after the order has been paid for online?
faq_text37: Our dealers ensure that all documentation, registration details are completed and deliver the vehicle at your doorstep. Every part of the purchase process is customizable & hassle free at NayaGaadi.
faq_text38: 15. Can the customer place an order via NayaGaadi from anywhere in India?
faq_text39: No & Yes. Currently this service is available only in Bengaluru. We are hard at work to expand our service to other cities at the latest.
faq_text40: Ultimately, we at NayaGaadi would like to provide any Indian citizen – either currently living in India or abroad, either in metro cities or the most remote villages - the ability to make a purchase through our portal.
faq_text41: We will be publishing a communiqué on NayaGaadi.com as we add more cities under our belt.
faq_text42: 17. Is the online marketplace model suitable for the automobile industry?
faq_text43: Yes. Today we have customers placing orders for heavy infrastructure such as furniture online; many more automobile makers are rushing to embrace the phygital (physical + digital) marketplace model to reach customers at places where traditional brick and mortar stores may be impossible to maintain.
faq_text44: There is no reason why e commerce cannot revolutionize the auto industry as well. The advantages of e commerce can help improve efficiencies in Sales, Inventory and Marketing areas using internet technology infrastructure.
faq_text45: 18. Is it the correct time for e commerce to take off in the Auto industry?
faq_text46: Establishing a physical showroom is a time consuming, expensive and complex process. Though the automotive industry is mostly traditional in nature, we believe this industry is ready to and needs to adapt to the online business trends in order to reach a newer generation of customers, adopt e commerce technology and leave no stone unturned in reaching the rural consumer - ultimately generating sustainable revenues.
faq_text48: Yes. Today online transactions are safer, easier and faster than offline payment methods. We have many tools / apps that help make payments via SMS/Mobile/Wallets/E-Cheques possible and make life easier.
faq_text49: With the push for a digital India, many dealers also prefer the online payment module. Step by step assistance will be provided to the customer through the entire payment procedure.
faq_text51: No. Dealers are ultimately looking for customers and new business opportunities. NayaGaadi provides them with an opportunity at both ends. Considering the competition, technological maturity of the consumer and the cost effectiveness of the e commerce model – it is safe to say that dealers in fact favor working with online players such as NayaGaadi rather than invest time, money and effort into a new brick and mortar store that may or may not generate the expected revenues.
faq_text52: 21.  What are the benefits one can look forward to when buying from NayaGaadi?
faq_text53: With NayaGaadi you have 24x7 assistance right from choosing your vehicle to delivery at your doorstep and beyond. We assist you with personalized services ranging from finance to auto repair and test drives.
faq_text54: Additional benefits depend on the brand, model and city at which the deal is in, as well as the benefits the company is willing to provide.
faq_text55: We encourage you to try our
faq_text57: package for the most comprehensive purchase experience we can offer.

faq_text59: Here at NayaGaadi we understand that awareness leads to adoption – or in other words: purchase.
faq_text60: We promote NayaGaadi actively through social media pages such as Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter. We also are featured in Print media – ranging from newspapers to automobile gazettes.
faq_text61: We are also grateful of the word of mouth promotion we have received from hundreds of customers such as you.
faq_text62: All brands associated with NayaGaadi can be found on our webpage.

pp_text11: In general, you can browse the Website without telling us who you are or revealing any personal information about yourself. pp_text12: We use data collection devices such as 'cookies' on certain pages of the Website to help analyse our web page flow, measure promotional effectiveness, and promote trust and safety. 'Cookies' are small files/ piece of information stored by a web server on a web browser so it can be later read back from that browser. The acceptance of cookies is not a requirement for visiting the Website. However, we would like to point out that some functionality on the Website and ordering is only possible with the activation of cookies. Cookies are tiny text files which identify your computer to our server as a unique user when you visit certain pages on the Website and they are stored by your internet browser on your computer's hard drive. Usually, cookies contain two pieces of information: a site name and a unique user ID. Cookies cannot be used alone to identify you, although they may be used to identify your IP address. We also use cookies to allow you to enter your password less frequently during a session. Cookies can also help us provide information that is targeted to your interests. Most cookies are 'session cookies,' meaning that they are automatically deleted from your hard drive at the end of a session. You are always free to decline our cookies if your browser permits, although in that case you may not be able to use certain features on the Website and you may be required to re-enter your password more frequently during a session. Additionally, you may encounter cookies' or other similar devices on certain pages of the Website that are placed by third parties. We do not control the  use of cookies by third parties. If you choose to buy/ transact on the Website, we collect information about your buying/ transaction behaviour. When you transact with us, we collect some additional information, such as a billing address, a credit/ debit card number and a credit / debit card  expiration date and/ or other payment instrument details and tracking information from cheques or money orders.

terms_text231: Generally, transactions are conducted smoothly on NayaGaadi. However, there may be some cases where both the Buyers and Sellers may face issues. A 'Dispute' can be defined as a disagreement between a Buyer and a Seller in connection with a transaction on the Website.

terms_text233: Disputes are filed as a result of a disagreement between the Buyer and the Seller. Disputes arise out of an issue that is raised by either party not being completely satisfied with the resolution of their complaint/issue.
terms_text234: It is important that before a Buyer/Seller raises a dispute, they should attempt to solve the issue. Please note that whenever a Buyer raises a dispute, the Seller's payment for that order is put on hold immediately until the issue is resolved.
terms_text236: Whenever there is a disagreement, the Buyer can write to support@NayaGaadi.com, while the Seller can write to seller support@NayaGaadi.com, in order to raise a dispute. Disputes can be raised at a particular transaction level. Buyer(s) can also raise a dispute through ‘My account section’ by logging in to their account. Seller(s) can also raise a dispute through ‘Store manager section’ by logging in to their account.
terms_text237: WHAT ARE THE VARIOUS TYPES OF 'DISPUTES'?
terms_text238: Following are the indicative examples of potential disputes: Item Not as described, Damaged Product, Part/Accessory missing, Seller Description/Specification Wrong, Defective (Functional issues), Product not working and Manufacturer claims invalid Invoice, In case the Seller rejects the return request of the Buyer, and Buyer raises a dispute, then NayaGaadi will try to mediate and resolve the dispute between both the parties. If the dispute is resolved in favour of the Buyer, a refund is provided once the product is returned to the Seller. If the dispute is settled in favour of the Seller, Buyer is entitled to any refund. Final resolution provided by NayaGaadi after taking into consideration all facts and proofs shall be final and binding on Buyer(s) and Seller(s).
terms_text240: In case of a dispute where the Seller is unable to provide a refund or a replacement, NayaGaadi will actively work towards reaching a resolution.

Only after verifying these facts, a dispute can be registered.

terms_text291: The NayaGaadi Bug Bounty Program (“Program”) is a program organized by NayaGaadi Technology Private Limited (“NayaGaadi”/ “we”/ “us”/ “our”). NayaGaadi is committed to security of data and technology. We reward reporters ( referred as “Submitter(s)”/ “you”/ “your”) for the responsible disclosure of in-scope issues and exploitation techniques and / or for any potential threat including for reporting bugs, especially those pertaining to exploits and vulnerabilities.
terms_text292: If you discover a bug, we appreciate your cooperation in responsibly investigating and reporting it to us so that we can address it as soon as possible.
terms_text294: The Program offers bounties/rewards for security software bugs which meet the following criteria:
terms_text295: The bug has a direct security impact and falls under one of our Vulnerability Categories listed below.
terms_text296: The minimum reward for eligible bugs is a digital certificate. Bounty amounts are not negotiable and can be changed any time, at the sole discretion of NayaGaadi.
terms_text297: One (1) valid bug equals to one (1) reward.
terms_text298: Multiple submissions over time can be eligible for “Hall of Fame” or a digital certificate.
terms_text299: In situations where a bug does not warrant a bounty/reward, we may at our own discretion and decision of NayaGaadi, issue a digital certificate. Our certification process is multi-leveled:
terms_text305: Our “Hall of Fame” page recognizes the contributions of reporters who have demonstrated a high level of dedication to our Program.
terms_text306: Acceptance of the bounty(s) requires multiple valid reports and remains at the discretion of our team. Eligibility for bounty/rewards and bounty/reward amount is at the sole discretion of NayaGaadi.
terms_text307: You are responsible for all/ any taxes associated with and imposed on any bounty/rewards you may receive in connection with your submission.
